beers.notes: Notes of banana nut bread, frosted cereal, sticky toffee pudding, and 23 different flavors.
beers.description: Banana Pudding Dark Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped withUK First Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on gobs of banana puree and Tahitian Vanilla Beans.
beers.summary:
Banana Pudding Dark Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped withUK First Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on gobs of banana puree and Tahitian Vanilla Beans.
Notes of banana nut bread, frosted cereal, sticky toffee pudding, and 23 different flavors.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #22. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #22. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of cherry pie filling, creaky barns, raspberry preserves, and oatmeal cookies.
beers.description: Local Cherry Farmhouse Ale. 4.8% Brewed with pilsner malt and raw wheat. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented with our Magickal saison yeast in an open top stainless tank upon mountains of sweet white and tart red cherries from our main man Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruits in Adams County.
beers.summary:
Local Cherry Farmhouse Ale. 4.8% Brewed with pilsner malt and raw wheat. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented with our Magickal saison yeast in an open top stainless tank upon mountains of sweet white and tart red cherries from our main man Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruits in Adams County.
Notes of cherry pie filling, creaky barns, raspberry preserves, and oatmeal cookies.

beers.notes: Notes of hard candies, dandelion greens, red sorrel , and underripe peach.
beers.description: Watermelon Shiso Table Bier. 4.2% Brewed with raw barley grown out of our spent grain by our dear pals at Two Particular Ares. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisslespalt alongside heaps of shiso from Jean's farm. Fermented in stainless with our Magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on local heirloom Moon and Star watermelons.
beers.summary:
Watermelon Shiso Table Bier. 4.2% Brewed with raw barley grown out of our spent grain by our dear pals at Two Particular Ares. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisslespalt alongside heaps of shiso from Jean's farm. Fermented in stainless with our Magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on local heirloom Moon and Star watermelons.
Notes of hard candies, dandelion greens, red sorrel , and underripe peach.

beers.notes: otes of  sticky gum, mineral water, tangerine lace, and Meyer lemon zest.
beers.description: Noble Hopped Saison. 5.4% Brewed with oats and spelt. Hopped in the kettle with an array of German hops. Fermented with our magickal saison yeast. Dry hopped with Callista and Hallertau Mittelfruh. Brewed in collaboration with our pal Joe Beddia.
beers.summary:
Noble Hopped Saison. 5.4% Brewed with oats and spelt. Hopped in the kettle with an array of German hops. Fermented with our magickal saison yeast. Dry hopped with Callista and Hallertau Mittelfruh. Brewed in collaboration with our pal Joe Beddia.
otes of  sticky gum, mineral water, tangerine lace, and Meyer lemon zest.

beers.notes: Notes of candied grapefruit rind, candied pineapple, peppery white sage, deep guava perfume, and drippy donut peaches.
beers.description: Milkshake IPA. 7.2% Brewed with heavy amounts of fluffy malted oats and wheat. Intensely hopped AND dry hopped with hand selected Citra and Mosaic. Conditioned atop a melange of sweet Madagascar vanilla beans, pungent guava pure, and fresh pineapple lavender. A real bright yet comfortable noodle twister that evokes tropical waves of bliss and peace with each sniff and sip. Dreamt up with our lava surfin' shredders over at Omnipollo.
beers.summary:
Milkshake IPA. 7.2% Brewed with heavy amounts of fluffy malted oats and wheat. Intensely hopped AND dry hopped with hand selected Citra and Mosaic. Conditioned atop a melange of sweet Madagascar vanilla beans, pungent guava pure, and fresh pineapple lavender. A real bright yet comfortable noodle twister that evokes tropical waves of bliss and peace with each sniff and sip. Dreamt up with our lava surfin' shredders over at Omnipollo.
Notes of candied grapefruit rind, candied pineapple, peppery white sage, deep guava perfume, and drippy donut peaches.

beers.notes: Notes of overripe apricot, orange marmalade, wildflower bouquets, and green smarties.
beers.description: Farmhouse Double IPA. 8% Brewed with mountains of fluffy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and Idaho7. Fermented warm in stainless with Norwegian Farmhouse yeast. Aggressively dry hopped with Wakatu and Kazbek.
beers.summary:
Farmhouse Double IPA. 8% Brewed with mountains of fluffy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and Idaho7. Fermented warm in stainless with Norwegian Farmhouse yeast. Aggressively dry hopped with Wakatu and Kazbek.
Notes of overripe apricot, orange marmalade, wildflower bouquets, and green smarties.

beers.notes: Notes of Champagne mango, bright rhubarb, French breakfast radish, and fresh cucumber.
beers.description: Carrot Brett Saison. 5.6% Brewed entirely with malted barley and cold pressed carrot juice from our local Ardmore pal, the Juice Dr.. Gently hopped in the kettle with Hallertau Mittelfruh. Primary Fermentation in stainless steel with our house brettanomyces ulture that we've harvested at our Dispensary.
beers.summary:
Carrot Brett Saison. 5.6% Brewed entirely with malted barley and cold pressed carrot juice from our local Ardmore pal, the Juice Dr.. Gently hopped in the kettle with Hallertau Mittelfruh. Primary Fermentation in stainless steel with our house brettanomyces ulture that we've harvested at our Dispensary.
Notes of Champagne mango, bright rhubarb, French breakfast radish, and fresh cucumber.
